mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.seq, b.board_type, b.title, m.nickname as writer, b.txt, b.write_date, b.total_count, row_number() over (order by b.seq desc) as rn FROM ${board_name}_BOARDS b JOIN members m ON b.writer = m.code ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startPost} AND #{endPost}

mapper.update: update ${board_name}_BOARDS set total_count = total_count + 1 where seq = #{seq}
